dmca.title: Copyright Infringement: MagazinePriceWatch.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Michael Coley [mailto:mcoley@magazinepricesearch.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, November 16, 2006 3:38 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Infringement: MagazinePriceWatch.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement: MagazinePriceWatch.com



Dear Sirs,

 

I would like to file a claim of copyright infringement against your
customer, MagazinePriceWatch.com, and I request that you suspend the
domain as soon as you have confirmed the infringement.

 

The infringer has substantially copied almost our entire site,
MagazinePriceSearch.com, including site structure, wording on numerous
pages, and site features.  In more detail, here are some examples of
copyrighted material they have copied:

 

1) Their help page is an exact copy of our help page, including all
text, bold attributes, and words in ALL CAPS.  Only the name of the site
is changed.

 

2) On the main page, the left column is links to magazines by price
(with the same price ranges that we use) and links to categories.  The
main part of the page includes some general text telling how many
magazines, merchants, and coupons are tracked, plus a sampling of
magazines, six with cover images and the rest as just text.  This is
exactly how our main page has looked since 2003, with the exception of
price ranges, which we added in 2004.

 

3) They have sections of the site for the most popular magazines, recent
price drops, a merchant list, coupons, and magazine packages.  These are
our major sections as well.

 

4) The coupons they have listed are mostly exclusive coupons that the
merchants have provided to MagazinePriceSearch.com.  A partial list of
them include MPS15 and MPS1575 from BestDealMagazines.com, MPS5 and
MPS15 from Deekins.com, DCMPS5 and several others from NetMagazines.com.

 

5) On the magazine detail pages, they list all of the descriptions from
all of the merchants, which is exactly what we have done since 2003.

 

You should be able to easily see that the information is has been copied
from MagazinePriceSearch.com.  You can also use the Wayback machine
(http://web.archive.org <http://web.archive.org/> ) to verify that our
site has looked like it does since 2003.

 

If you have trouble verifying any of this information, please contact
me:

 

Michael Coley

MagazinePriceSearch.com

mcoley@magazinepricesearch.com

PO Box 1020

Mansfield, TX 76063

817-561-4896

 

The infringer does not and never has had authorization to use the
material in this way.

 

I affirm that this information is accurate and that I am the owner of
said copyrights.

 

/s/ Michael Coley
